title: Who are YOUR top 3 permaban champions?
body:
Just wanted to know who you guys like to ban in Ranked, and why you ban them.

For me, my top 3 permaban champs are {{champion:64}}{{champion:67}}{{champion:157}}.

Do I think any of these champions are OP, or even decent? Not really. In fact, all three of them hover around 48-49% win rate. So why do I ban them?

{{champion:64}} - I ban this champ because statistically he is the most played Jungler in the game, even more than {{champion:104}}. This means that banning him gives me the highest chance of screwing over the enemy jungler even before the game starts.

{{champion:67}} and {{champion:157}} - I ban both of them for the exact same reason: They int so damn often, and when they int, they int HARD. I haven't had a game with a {{champion:67}} where she doesn't die at least 6 times. For {{champion:157}}, he dies at least 7 times every time he's on my team. It's like the moment you play a champ like {{champion:67}} or {{champion:157}}, you get this massive inexplicable desire to constantly try 'sick outplayz!' and 'insaaane mechanics!', and then get yourself killed.

Who are YOUR top 3 permaban champions, and why do you ban them? Leave your answers in the comments below.

replies.body: {{champion:104}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:202}}
{{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:105}}
{{champion:7}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:7}}

{{champion:9}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:555}} 

Fiddle and Brand are pretty obvious - obscene, obnoxious damage with very little risk.  And Pyke just has my number for some reason - he's one of those champs that I just can't seem to play against, no matter what.
Riot's balance team as all 3?

my priority goes on

1st {{champion:142}} / {{champion:157}}  if one of them is in meta,i don't think i need to explain why

2nd {{champion:117}} i play assassins/low range mages and i would like to be allowed to exist in the game,i mean anyone who isn't a tank or artillery mage is going to eat a  2.25 sec point click disable and if somehow they avoid/survive to that they have to deal with an ADC with the same HP of your tank (in shields and bonus HP)  and empowered AA's

3rd {{champion:203}} / {{champion:154}} depends by who is in meta,too obnoxious to deal with,with zac there is no safe place from his gank and you can't even ward it (you'd need like 9 wards for being sure he can't gank you near YOUR tower),kindred deals shitons of damage and his ult is too annoying
I'm glad someone's with me on banning Kindred. Whenever she's meta, she ruins jungling for literally everyone else because she's ranged. At least with Elise, she's somewhat easy to deal with.

many underestimate kindred,when she's in  meta she's an ADC and assassin (with her E burst she can be called assassin) with an AoE {{champion:23}} ult which is basically a fk you to any assassin/melee champion
Imagine being an assassin that has an anti-assassin tool lmao

{{champion:63}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:223}} 

i alternate between draven and ezreal. just whoever is more meta

hmm well usually i ban for what i feel my team cant handle or what i see my teams comp is bad vs.

but in general of late

My top 3 permabans are as follows -

{{champion:119}} - Flat out annoying to deal with, find it unfair he has a B.F Sword's worth of damage at level 1. Supposed to fall off if the game goes late but doesn't.

{{champion:202}} - Stormrazor interaction with his passive needs to be removed. Playing vs Jhin is very anti fun.

{{champion:21}} - "Lane Bully" who's also supposed to fall off late game but doesn't due to Dark Harvest
{{champion:11}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:145}}

why is this so downvoted?

> [{quoted}](name=ankoanko19,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pPwunupY,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2018-09-06T19:40:26.390+0000)
>
> why is this so downvoted?

Because Boards doesn't like being told what to do.

These are, bar none, the strongest picks in the game right now.

Graves and Jhin have presence in 30-50% of all games and Kassadin was considered worthy of a hotfix, if that tells you anything.
just ban whatever is meta G. So currently I guess {{champion:84}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:38}} shit like that
Sona or Swain on my botlane smurf, riven garen kennen on my toplane main

I am going to kind of cheat and list my Permaban for each lane
Top Lane {{champion:122}}  Very annoying lane bully and super hard to fight in lane with his q sustain and passive
Jungle {{champion:11}} Two reasons. One Just an annoying snowball champ that thrives on stealing kills. Second If on the enemy team they are a god and the complete opposite when on yours and is usually a toxic player.
Mid {{champion:238}} Assassin with long range poke and has very safe all in potential. Nuff said.
ADC/Bot {{champion:81}}  He flashes in front of you and bursts you down and has really good poke
Support {{champion:143}}  She makes her bot lane a 2v4 with her plants and has some strong cc also anyone who plays her support is a HEARTLESS MONSTER

{{champion:105}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:202}} 

Obnoxious cancer.
{{champion:11}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:24}}

{{champion:412}} When I play my mains its always against a thresh main that can take me out of the fight and prevent me from helping in the mid and late game. Shaco Syndrome.

{{champion:35}} Team usually cant understand when I ping the enemy jungle is going to gank very soon and continues to push and then die plus hes so annoying to fight if its a good shaco. Also Shaco Syndrome.

{{champion:157}} Shaco Syndrome again.
{{champion:238}} or else we wont have a adc during teamfights. {{champion:157}} becuse his a big flipcoin, either get super fed. or hard feed. {{champion:58}} just find him annoying

All timers: {{champion:157}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:164}} 

Current patch: {{champion:38}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:157}}

1st Ban {{champion:412}} Difficult to win vs a Thresh lane,  regardless of his adc
 - Super tanky early (esp with aftershock)
-Abnormally long cc duration between Q and E, 
-E goes through minions meaning there is always the threat of Thresh just running up on you, 
-W sets up easy ganks/ impossible saves that no one else can do, so a ban removes it entirely
-Capable of a higher damage output during laning phase than one would expect. 
-Typically zones hard all laning phase long and has the durability to make punishing his zone with an all-in a bad idea

2nd Ban {{champion:157}}
- Windwall. Ban Yasuo and suddenly the other 150 champs can use their ranged abilities in peace
-Snowball factor. Yasuo gets fed during laning, hilarity ensues
-Abnormally high amount of personal agency

3rd Ban situational {{champion:107}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:39}}  depending on whichever are the most obnoxious in the current meta

{{champion:157}} Over played And windwall is annoying 
{{champion:67}} the No fun zone for tanks specially when you already locked one in. 
If these champions are banned beofre I can ring my ban on them. Id go for one of these
 {{champion:238}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:145}}

{{champion:238}} When I think my mid laner will do bad
{{champion:39}} When I think my top laner would do bad
{{champion:25}}/{{champion:145}}  When I actually want to have fun in bot lane

Zed , Fizz , Talon

{{champion:104}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:58}} 

top 3 reasons why i find the balance team to be a joke.

Kindred

Cancer ass fucking kit that should have never been made.

Having range as a component for infinite scale is riot's absolute dumbest decision. Having an adc even semi viable in the jungle has never been healthy (see twitch, graves, etc), and tailor making an adc to thrive in the jungle while still fulfilling the team's role as ADC is supreme garbage design.

I used to not ban her because she was literally 1% PR and her numbers were bad enough to mask the ludicrousness of her kit, but she saw a string of buffs and a relatively mild nerf that has her back on my ban radar.
You should try maining her. I bet you'll do well.. most of the times I think a champ is op, I play it and im amazing

>
> You should try maining her. I bet you'll do well.. most of the times I think a champ is op, I play it and im amazing

Is that your best argument?

NO, I wil not main her, because she ISN'T FUN for me.

But HAVING PLAYED her in the past and against her, I stand by my statement that her kit is fucking retarded.
